title: Customized Language Education Program to Strengthen Cognitive Processes in International Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: A course where in-service elementary teachers experience diverse cultural contexts they may encounter in international learning environments through VR simulations, developing language education strategies tailored to learning styles

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their learning styles and design three or more strategies applicable to international educational environments
Learners can recognize cultural differences in VR simulations and execute two effective problem-solving approaches
Through project-based assessment, learners develop language education scenarios applying critical thinking and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
